description: Named for HOKA Athlete Karl “Speedgoat” Meltzer, the Speedgoat 4 is part of an award-winning family known for making quick work of technical terrain. The fourth edition features a new breathable yet rugged mesh. Hoka included 3D printed overlays for increased midfoot support and an overall more secure feel. Most importantly, Hoka added a more accommodating fit in the toe box for a more comfortable ride. Grippy on the uphill and secure on the downhill, the Speedgoat 4 is badass on every trail.
name: Hoka Speedgoat 4 - Mens
